purpleculture_pinyin:
guǎng
wide; numerous; to spread
широкий; многочисленные; распространять
rtega_mnemonic:
廣廣RS
广广		広broad, wide, extensive
  • yellow 黃 cliff side 广: broad place natural feature
  • secret 厶 house on the hill 广 with a broad 广 view
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 广)
Antonyms: 窄
Pictophonetic: 黄 indicates the sound; 广 (building) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
廣大 [ guǎng dà ]: (of an area) vast or extensive; large-scale; widespread; (of people) numerous
廣告 [ guǎng gào ]: to advertise; a commercial; advertisement; Classifiers: 项
廣泛 [ guǎng fàn ]: extensive; wide range
廣州 [ guǎng zhōu ]: Guangzhou subprovincial city and capital of Guangdong; Canton
廣東 [ guǎng dōng ]: Guangdong province (Kwangtung) in south China, short name 粤 , capital Guangzhou 广州
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿸ Surround from upper left
    • 广 [ guǎng ] broad, vast, wide; building, house
    • 黄 [ huáng ] yellow; surname
heisig_chinese_memo: In the sunshine (yellow) state, California, you can find an extensive number of cliffs and canyons to hike up and see beautiful views.
Ru_trainchinese:
guǎng: (графема) многочисленный; расширять(ся); (сокр.) провинция Гуандун, город Гуанчжоу
guǎng: (прил) широкий, обширный
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the yellow (黃) patch under the stony cliff (广) is broad
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Living in a cliff house (or cave) gives you extensive space.
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle starts from "宀", " yellow " sound. Bronze inscriptions from " Guang ", " Yellow " sound. " Luo " resembles the shape of a house. " Guang " resembles a simpler building than " Liu " (Qiu Xigui). The original meaning of " guang " is a big house. Duan Yucai believes that the original meaning of " guang " is a big house without walls around it. "Shu Wen": "Guang, the big house of the hall. From Guang, the yellow sound." Duan Yucai's note: "The hall means that the hall has no walls...the one who covers it is the house, and there is a big covering without walls. The one who understands it is Hongyuan, Yueguang." Gu Bei said.

From Dawu's extension, " wide " can be used to express the meaning of broadness, vastness, augmentation, and promotion.

Inscriptions " Guang " mostly come from " Guang " and sometimes from "宀". "宀" and "广" are the meanings of " guang ". They are like buildings and can be used as components. In the later period, the inscriptions or false works were from the " factory ", and the " guang " and " factory " were similar in shape, so they were mixed. " Yellow " is the sound symbol.

Oracle is used as a person's name. In addition to being used as a person's name, the inscriptions also indicate greatness. Ban Gui: "Guangchenglu (jue) Gong (gong)" means great accomplishment. "poetry. Xiaoya. "June": "Four Muxiu Guang", Mao Heng Chuan: "Guang, Da Ye." "Guang Ya. "Explanation": "Guang, Da Ye." It also means a wide range. Jin Gong Basin: "Guang 𤔲 (Si) Quartet", which means to govern the Quartet extensively. "Guangfa" means a large-scale, large-scale military offensive. Many friends: "Guangfa Jing (division)". Yu Ding: "Yuhou Yu Fangyou (rates) Nanhuai corpses (barbarian), Eastern corpses (barbarian), broadly conquered south or (country), east or (country), as far as the calendar is. Enlighten and inspire. Uncle Xiang's father Yu Gui: "Guang Qi Yu body", Shifu Zhong: "Use Guang Qi Shi father's body." Yang Shuda believes that "Guang Qi" means great help. Also used as a place name, "Guangyan" belonged to Hexi County in the Han Dynasty, in the southwest of Zhungeer Banner, Inner Mongolia. Guang Yan Spear: "Guang Yan".

The bamboo slips of the Warring States period also expressed a large scope, "Sleeping Tiger Land. The Eighteen Kinds of Laws of the Qin Dynasty" Jan. 98: "The Guanshi is the same thing, and its small and large, short and long, wide clip (narrow) must wait."

" Guang " later expressed the distance from east to west, and "袤" expressed the distance from south to north. The word "袤" in "Shuowen" goes under: "The north and the south are called the vastness, and the east and the west are called broad." "Sleeping Tiger Land. Eighteen Kinds of Laws of the Qin Dynasty" 66: "The cloth is eight feet wide, and the blessing (width) is two feet five inches wide. To spread evil, the vastness is not as wide as the style, it will not work."

The ancient book "Vastness" is also used as "Guanglun" to indicate the area of land, "Han Shu. Biography of the Western Regions: "Pu Changhai, a Yanze Zheye, went to Yumen and Yangguan for more than three hundred miles, and a vast expanse of three hundred miles." "Zhou Li. Land official. "Da Situ": "Based on the map of the world and the land, we know the number of large wheels in Kyushu." Jia Gongyan: "Ma Rongyun: "East and east are broad, and north and south are wheels.""
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle starts with "宀", " yellow " sound. Bronze inscriptions from " Guang ", " Yellow " sound. " Luo " resembles the shape of a house. " Guang " resembles a simpler building than " Liu " (Qiu Xigui). The original meaning of " guang " is a big house. The extension is broad and vast.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從「宀」，「黃」聲。金文從「广」，「黃」聲。「宀」象房屋之形，「广」象比「宀」簡單的建築(裘錫圭)，「廣」的本義是大屋。段玉裁認為「廣」的本義是四周沒有牆壁的大屋。《說文》：「廣，殿之大屋也。从广，黃聲。」段玉裁注：「殿謂堂無四壁……覆乎上者曰屋，無四壁而上有大覆蓋，其所通者宏遠矣，是曰廣。」姑備一說。

　　由大屋引申，「廣」可用來表現廣闊、廣大、增廣、推廣等義。

　　金文「廣」多從「广」，間或從「宀」，「宀」、「广」是「廣」的意符，皆象建築物，作為部件可以通用。後期金文或訛作從「厂」，「广」、「厂」形近，所以相混。「黃」是聲符。

　　甲骨文用作人名。金文除用作人名外，還表示大，班簋：「廣成氒(厥)工(功)」，表示大成其功業。《詩．小雅．六月》：「四牡脩廣」，毛亨傳：「廣，大也。」《廣雅．釋詁》：「廣，大也。」又表示範圍廣大，晉公盆：「廣𤔲(司)四方」，表示廣泛地治理四方。「廣伐」表示大規模、大範圍軍事進攻，多友鼎：「廣伐京𠂤(師)」。禹鼎：「噩侯馭方䢦(率)南淮尸(夷)、東尸(夷)廣伐南或(國)、東或(國)，至于歷內。」「廣啟」表示大大地啟迪、啟發。叔向父禹簋：「廣啟禹身」，士父鐘：「用廣啟士父身。」楊樹達則認為「廣啟」是大力佑助之意。又用作地名，「廣衍」在漢朝屬河西郡，在今內蒙準格爾旗西南。廣衍矛：「廣衍」。

　　戰國竹簡也表示大的範圍，《睡虎地．秦律十八種》簡98：「關市為器同物者，其小大、短長、廣夾(狹)必等。」

　　「廣」後來又表示從東到西的距離，「袤」表示從南到北的距離。《說文》「袤」字下云：「南北曰袤，東西曰廣。」《睡虎地．秦律十八種》簡66：「布袤八尺，福(幅)廣二尺五寸。布惡，其廣袤不如式者，不行。」

　　古書「廣袤」又作「廣輪」，表示土地的面積，《漢書．西域傳》：「蒲昌海，一名鹽澤者也，去玉門、陽關三百餘里，廣袤三百里。」《周禮．地官．大司徒》：「以天下土地之圖，周知九州之地域廣輪之數。」賈公彥疏：「馬融云：『東西為廣，南北為輪。』」
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從「宀」，「黃」聲。金文從「广」，「黃」聲。「宀」象房屋之形，「广」象比「宀」簡單的建築(裘錫圭)，「廣」的本義是大屋。引申為寬廣、廣大。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
廣 (Simplified: 广)
Pinyin: guǎng
English Definition: wide; numerous; to spread
Antonyms: 窄
Total strokes: 14; Radical: 广
Pictophonetic: 黄 indicates the sound; 广 (building) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿸ Surround from upper left
    • 广 [ guǎng ] broad, vast, wide; building, house
    • 黄 [ huáng ] yellow; surname
Example Words:
廣大 [ guǎng dà ]: (of an area) vast or extensive; large-scale; widespread; (of people) numerous
廣告 [ guǎng gào ]: to advertise; a commercial; advertisement; Classifiers: 项
廣泛 [ guǎng fàn ]: extensive; wide range
廣州 [ guǎng zhōu ]: Guangzhou subprovincial city and capital of Guangdong; Canton
廣東 [ guǎng dōng ]: Guangdong province (Kwangtung) in south China, short name 粤 , capital Guangzhou 广州
More: 廣* | *廣 | *廣*

①指面積、範圍寬闊，與“狹”相對：寬廣。廣博。廣義。廣漠。廣袤(東西稱“廣”，南北稱“袤”，指土地面積)。廣廈。
②多：大庭廣衆。
③擴大，擴充：推廣。廣開言路。

Chinese: In the sunshine (yellow) state, California, you can find an extensive number of cliffs and canyons to hike up and see beautiful views.
Meaning: extensive
Hanzi: 广
Story: Living in a cliff house (or cave) gives you extensive space.
Kind: traditional

甲骨文從「 宀 」，「 黃 」聲。金文從「 广 」，「 黃 」聲。「 宀 」象房屋之形，「 广 」象比「 宀 」簡單的建築(裘錫圭)，「 廣 」的本義是大屋。段玉裁認為「 廣 」的本義是四周沒有牆壁的大屋。《說文》：「廣，殿之大屋也。从广，黃聲。」段玉裁注：「殿謂堂無四壁……覆乎上者曰屋，無四壁而上有大覆蓋，其所通者宏遠矣，是曰廣。」姑備一說。 由大屋引申，「 廣 」可用來表現廣闊、廣大、增廣、推廣等義。 金文「 廣 」多從「 广 」，間或從「 宀 」，「 宀 」、「 广 」是「 廣 」的意符，皆象建築物，作為部件可以通用。後期金文或訛作從「 厂 」，「 广 」、「 厂 」形近，所以相混。「 黃 」是聲符。 甲骨文用作人名。金文除用作人名外，還表示大，班簋：「廣成氒(厥)工(功)」，表示大成其功業。《詩．小雅．六月》：「四牡脩廣」，毛亨傳：「廣，大也。」《廣雅．釋詁》：「廣，大也。」又表示範圍廣大，晉公盆：「廣𤔲(司)四方」，表示廣泛地治理四方。「廣伐」表示大規模、大範圍軍事進攻，多友鼎：「廣伐京𠂤(師)」。禹鼎：「噩侯馭方䢦(率)南淮尸(夷)、東尸(夷)廣伐南或(國)、東或(國)，至于歷內。」「廣啟」表示大大地啟迪、啟發。叔向父禹簋：「廣啟禹身」，士父鐘：「用廣啟士父身。」楊樹達則認為「廣啟」是大力佑助之意。又用作地名，「廣衍」在漢朝屬河西郡，在今內蒙準格爾旗西南。廣衍矛：「廣衍」。 戰國竹簡也表示大的範圍，《睡虎地．秦律十八種》簡98：「關市為器同物者，其小大、短長、廣夾(狹)必等。」 「 廣 」後來又表示從東到西的距離，「 袤 」表示從南到北的距離。《說文》「 袤 」字下云：「南北曰袤，東西曰廣。」《睡虎地．秦律十八種》簡66：「布袤八尺，福(幅)廣二尺五寸。布惡，其廣袤不如式者，不行。」 古書「廣袤」又作「廣輪」，表示土地的面積，《漢書．西域傳》：「蒲昌海，一名鹽澤者也，去玉門、陽關三百餘里，廣袤三百里。」《周禮．地官．大司徒》：「以天下土地之圖，周知九州之地域廣輪之數。」賈公彥疏：「馬融云：『東西為廣，南北為輪。』」

廣字的基本解释

廣
guǎng
见“广”。

廣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guǎng］
［《廣韻》古晃切，上蕩，見。］
“广3”的繁体字。
(1)四周没有墙壁的大屋。
(2)大。在体积、面积等方面超过一般。
(3)大。指规模、范围、程度等超过一般。
(4)远。指距离长。
(5)远。指志向等远大。
(6)扩大。
(7)推衍；补充。
(8)多。
(9)谓增多。
(10)宽阔。
(11)指宽度。
(12)宽宏。
(13)宽缓。
(14)宽慰。
(15)普遍；广泛。
(16)地名。古广州的省称。
(17)亦作广东、广州的省称。如广货；广交会。称两广时则为广东、广西的略称。
(18)姓。宋有广汉。
[②]［guàng］
［《集韻》古曠切，去宕，見。］
“广4”的繁体字。
(1)兵车。亦指三十乘兵车。
(2)军队的左右翼，亦各称广。
(3)横。
(4)直径。
(5)量宽度。
[③]［kuàng］
［《字彙》苦謗切］
“广5”的繁体字。
(1)通“曠”。开朗，旷达。
(

廣字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【广字部】　廣； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页351第03
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?古晃切，光上聲。【說文】殿之大屋也。　又【玉篇】廣，大也。【廣韻】廣，闊也。【易·繫辭】廣大配天地。【疏】大以配天，廣以配地。　又州名。【唐書·地理志】嶺南道有廣州。　又姓。【姓譜】出丹陽，廣成子之後，宋有廣漢。　又【玉篇】古曠切，光去聲。【周禮·地官·大司徒】周知九州之地域廣輪之數。【疏】馬融云：東西爲廣，南北爲輪。【釋文】廣，古曠反。　又車名。【周禮·春官·車僕】廣車之萃。【註】廣車，橫?之車也。【釋文】廣，古曠反。【左傳·僖二十八年】西廣東宮。【疏】楚有左右廣，蓋兵車之名。【宣二年】分爲二廣。【註】十五乗爲一廣。　又【正字通】音曠。【荀子·王霸篇】人主胡不廣焉。【註】廣，開泰貌。　又與曠通。【前漢·五行志】師出過時之謂廣。　又姑黃切，音光。【爾雅·釋獸】回毛在背，闋廣。【疏】伯樂相馬法，旋毛在背者名闋廣。【音義】廣，音光。　又【韻補】叶果五切，音古。【禮·樂記】今夫古樂，進旅退旅，和正以廣，弦匏笙簧，會守拊鼓，始奏

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guǎng］
["Guangyun" Gu Huang cut, swing up, see you. ]
Traditional characters for "广3".
(1) A big house with no walls around.
(2) Big. Exceeds the general in terms of volume and area.
(3) Big. Refers to the scale, scope, degree, etc. exceeding general.
(4) Far away. Refers to long distances.
(5) Far away. Refers to lofty ambitions.
(6) Expand.
(7) Derivation; supplement.
(8) More.
(9) Said to increase.
(10) Broad.
(11) Refers to width.
(12) Liberal.
(13) Leniency.
(14) Relief.
(15) Universal; extensive.
(16) Place name. The provincial name of ancient Guangzhou.
(17) Also known as the provincial name of Guangdong and Guangzhou. Such as Guangzhou goods; Canton Fair. When it is called Guangdong and Guangxi, it is the abbreviation of Guangdong and Guangxi.
(18) Last name. Song You Guanghan.
[②]［guàng］
["Ji Yun" Gu Kuang cut, go to Dang, see you. ]
Traditional characters for "广4".
(1) Military vehicles. Also refers to thirty soldiers.
(2) The left and right wings of the army are also called broad.
(3) Horizontal.
(4) Diameter.
(5) Measure the width.
[③]［kuàng］
["Words" bitterly slander]
Traditional characters for "广5".
(1) Through "Kuang". Cheerful and broad-minded.
